508-section.scoreOne: Navigation between and with pages without the mouse is NOT possible
508-section.scoreThree: Navigation with the keyboard between pages and to key areas within pages is possible but some areas cannot be reached or when the focus is moved off to a secondary window, it cannot be moved back using the keyboard
508-section.scoreFive: Navigation with the keyboard between and within all pages is possible, including to and from secondary windows

instructions.header: With NVDA/JAWS turned OFF, start at your home page/state. Set aside your mouse and do the following

step.step1: Navigate to and through each of your test pages (tab, shift-tab, arrow, enter, and spacebar should provide a lot of functionality)
step.step3: Alt+Down Arrow opens drop down form fields
step.step5: Use any interactive components (maps, calculators, etc.)

instructions.subHeader: Repeat this proces with NVDA/JAWS turned ON if possible
instructions.note: When starting your screen reader you will need to close and reopen your browser
